html:
3.28.23  11:28 pm   do original intent or context and action matter more?

      i'm not sure which 2 (or 3?) things you're comparing here, but i'll chime in and add my 2 sense and say 'original context' is something i enjoy very much. not sure if you intended to include that in your multiple choice selection

3.28.23  10:59 pm   what would you like to learn more about?

      the ups and downs

3.28.23  10:52 pm   what song did you "hold onto" the longest before releasing it

      "i'm a princess" comes to mind

3.28.23  9:55 pm   is there a different proccess to writing shorter jingles then writing long songs? or is it basically the same process as it's both music.

      it's the same except when doing longer songs there's additional phenomena that come into play

3.28.23  9:53 pm   How much silliness is too much 

      the wrong amount of silliness; that will be just silly enough

3.28.23  8:41 pm   nature vs nurture, who wins?

      it's a tie

3.28.23  8:18 pm   sometimes i wish i would have started sooner. do you ever feel that, Mr. Wurtz?

     yep

     What do you do when you feel that?

     try to calm down

     Sometimes I think that I could make something very cool, but then I realize that I don't know what. What could I make that is very cool?

     too many things to list here. start making your list, in a separate document

     How do you usually find ideas to make your very cool things?

     i don't know exactly how to find ideas but it happens anyway. i find many many many many ideas, and then the first step of the production cycle is selecting one of those ideas to produce

     Do you think I will still make it to my dream of making a very cool thing, even though I have started so late?

     yes but it's probably not gonna be just 1 thing

3.28.23  7:37 pm   Are you fish?

      not quite

3.28.23  7:06 pm   Did the thought of not being good enough ever stop you from trying to make the thing you wanted to make?

     sure

     If yes, how can you tell when it's worth trying anyway?

      i'm not sure how you can tell, but you can

3.28.23  7:05 pm   do you like new wave?

      sure, even though i must admit it's pretty old at this point

3.28.23  6:46 pm   How do you practice losing

      do it a few times a week

3.28.23  5:34 pm   is being awake the same as being conscious?

      just about

3.28.23  3:01 pm   Are your songs ever finished 

      yes

3.28.23  1:55 pm   Do you accept multiple-choice questions?

      sometimes no

3.28.23  1:16 pm   How does the lobster section look?

      like a normal restaurant with meals on tables but no people at the tables, and also no lobsters

3.28.23  12:56 pm   are you a wizard

      no, but i know a couple of wizard gestures, which are pretty convenient to say the least

3.28.23  7:00 am   where do birds come from?

      the sky

3.28.23  3:15 am   Is there any way to do a sequence of things and not end up with a game? It keeps happening

     hmmm, i'm not sure

3.28.23  2:38 am   Is the adolescence of the human race about to end? If so, how, if at all, will humanity handle the responsibilities they would take on as fully-fledged adults for the first time in history?

      one of the main features, all throughout human history (and even non-human animal history before that), is the transitioning into more advanced and more efficient ways of existence. for the 'adolescence' analogy, you could just as well apply that same analogy to another phase, such as the time before the invention of writing. or, the time before the invention of electricity. either way, it's crazy and it always seems like none of this has ever happened before, at least on earth

3.28.23  1:20 am   two of my biggest musical inspirations currently are you and sondheim. bit random, innit. anyway, given that im meant to ask a question here: any tips on being  more like either with respect to knowing so much about music and making such good stuff?

      what's really gonna work for you, is being like you, and then do all the learning and knowing, as you. learning and knowing is something that anyone can do. especially you

3.28.23  12:54 am   Can you answer this question but in like a really silly font

      i would love to, except the problem is, no fonts are silly

3.28.23  12:44 am   is there a secret to starting a project without immediately throwing away ideas? i've had trouble recently getting anything finished because i never seem to get started.

      how about making a list of all the potential projects you have. all the starting points you have. then if you want you can cruise around making little updates on them, but then when you're ready you can look at the entire list and make a decision: your next project (to finish) is gonna be something. so you have to pick something from this list. and be aware that you have what it takes to finish whichever one you select. then once you've selected it, stay with it until you finish it. if you have to do re-writes, that's fine. you can send the team to lunch, brainstorm with the team over lunch, then hit it again in the afternoon. if you made a confident selection in the first place, you can always get through it

3.28.23  12:09 am   hi bill! in your song "got some money" you exclaim "'cause wednesday seems so long ago, i said it 3-4 songs ago" but when i looked through your songs, you did not exclaim this at all. why lie to us bill?

      musical lyrics are not supposed to be entirely non-fiction statements. at least i hope not... otherwise i'm in trouble. but the sentiment i was referring to is indeed true, and it's this: i must have said and expressed many many times before, musically and otherwise, that "it's time for the show", or, more specifically, that i've had the inclination that the show, for some reason, ought to be on Tuesdays

3.27.23  11:16 pm   do you do any scripting for EQ when manipulating the audio in a track? (audio from midi also)?

      i've made some keyboard shortcuts but they're not good enough

3.27.23  8:29 pm   what's your favorite odd time signature?

      1

3.27.23  7:20 pm   Is tea soup, and soup tea?

      i don't see why not

3.27.23  7:10 pm   In what year did you visit Alabama?

      2012

3.27.23  6:11 pm   Are you the next David Bowie?

      no

3.27.23  4:36 pm   do u have tricks to learn songs fast

      loving the song

3.27.23  4:24 pm   ever think about what it would be like to be someone else like not as a comparison or morals thing just to fully understand what kind of perspective someone else has

      yep

3.27.23  3:49 pm   You mentioned in the podcast you featured in considering the beatles that during your 2019 to 2020 break,  as well as working on 3d animating, you made a conscious shift in the style and or production of your music,

     did not say that

     but didn't say specifically what you changed about it, so what did you change?

     changed all the hardware and software, purely out of necessity

3.27.23  3:31 pm   would you say you're currently at a similar stage to where you were from may 2019 through august 2020, or is it more like the stage you were in between may 2021 to september of that same year, or is it a mix of the two?

      it's closer to the summer of 2021. i'd like to think i'm a bit more grounded than i was in 2019 and 2020. i'm not uprooting the entire process. actually i'm not dismantling anything in the existing process. and i have the existing process fresh in my memory because i went through it 15 times during 2022. so i'd like to think i have a pretty good idea on what improvements need to be made. i'm just trying to get it so that i can do the best work i can, as quickly as possible, on an ongoing basis

3.27.23  12:04 pm   how often do you engage in nondescript activity

      it's as hard to quantify as it is to describe

3.27.23  11:14 am   say i have C in the bass and E, G, A not in the bass. how do i decide whether this is C6 or an inversion of Am7?

     whatever looks better on the page

     does it matter?

      not really

3.27.23  11:08 am   ?just ever you do

      yes i do

3.27.23  10:47 am   What makes a roller coaster good

      the ups and downs

3.27.23  9:46 am   was bingo truly his name-o or is it a disguise to cover up something much deeper

      it's probably a cover up for an earlier song with the same melody

3.27.23  8:49 am   Have you tried surrendering to the Unknown?

      i don't know

3.27.23  8:45 am   What's the most romantic chord?

      romanticism can only be achieved by changing to different chords

3.27.23  6:56 am   I can't find a good melody for my song, what do?

      try making up 10 bad melodies. the results may surprise you

3.27.23  1:08 am   do you ever think about how there were prehistorically different species of humans and what they might've been like and whether they would've named their kids carl

      yes

3.27.23  12:03 am   What is your favorite song that you made

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

3.26.23  11:45 pm   how often do you find the word "overwhelming" more overwhelming than what it describes?

      it's usually just about right

3.26.23  8:54 pm   what do i do with my life

      only you have the answer, but you will see some bits of reflections of it, in others

3.26.23  6:15 pm   is a thing inventor just a sentient 3d printer

      no

3.26.23  4:58 pm   whats your favorite music you wrote

      i would prefer to write a new one to be my favorite

3.26.23  1:34 pm   what is jazz

      popular music in the 1920s, plus 100 years worth of typical mutations that occur with any genre name. so pretty much everything, by now

3.26.23  12:09 pm   thoughts about time?

     wild ride, but it's all we've ever known

     some ppl say you shoudnt think about it as being 'spent' or 'saved' but i still end up using that vocabulary because its easier to think about time that way. i was wondering how you think about time?

     it's a mindfuck but it would be a way bigger mindfuck if it weren't there. go figure

      do you see it as something to be spent?

     time 'spent' just refers to a time allotment. a way of breaking down how the time was used. it relates to time management

     why or why not?

     language

3.26.23  11:34 am   Whenever I go out,like to a bar, I tend to cut myself off from what's happening instead of fully engaging myself with what's happening. Like I want to be with a nice woman, but when the opportunity arises, I become apathetic and I fail to have the "oomph" to put myself out there and get people invested in me.

How can I combat/change this? And what can you say is the cause of this apathy? 

      i have no idea how to meet people in a social environment. i only know how to meet people when doing business

3.26.23  10:46 am   opinion on the notes A and F# being played simultaneously? 

      normal. this is a sign that everything's normal
